auth.loginSubtitle: Access your space to manage your publications and scientific data.
auth.useAdminCredentials: Use your administrator account email and password.
auth.signupSubtitle: Join the scientific collection and publishing platform. Free account.
auth.orcidHelp: Researcher ID to link your publications.
auth.termsAccept: I accept the terms of use and privacy policy of AfricaData, scientific publishing platform.
auth.signupSuccessMessage: Please confirm your email address. Check your inbox.
auth.signupSuccessNext: Once your email is confirmed, click the button below to log in.
auth.benefitPublicationsDesc: Access all your work and metadata
auth.benefitSubmitDesc: Submit new publications in a few clicks
auth.emailNotConfigured: Email login not configured. Set up Supabase (see .env.example).
auth.adminOnlyAccess: Access restricted to administrators. You are logged in as a user.
auth.signupFreeNote: Free registration. Access to publications according to your profile.
auth.signupNotConfigured: Signup not configured. In production add REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL and REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.
auth.googleNotConfigured: Google login not configured. Enable Google provider in Supabase.
auth.signupGoogleNotConfigured: Google signup not configured. Enable Google provider in Supabase.

home.heroLead: Collect, validate and disseminate your publications in a stable environment, compliant with Open Science standards and ready for international visibility.
home.heroTitleAlt: African scientific research, centralized and open
home.heroSubtitle: Explore, submit and share publications. Open access, indexing and international visibility.
home.indexingNote: Google Scholar, DOI and OAI-PMH indexing.
home.uniquePlatform: A single platform for the research value chain
home.uniquePlatformDesc: Editorial tools, secure workflows and dashboards for authors, editors and administrators.
home.publicationTypesDesc: A secure, interoperable repository ready for international dissemination.
home.africanReachDesc: Shared hub to connect laboratories across the continent.
home.certifiedQualityDesc: Rigorous editorial validation and full traceability.
home.fastIndexingDesc: Full-text search, filters and smart suggestions.
home.realtimeAnalyticsDesc: Measure the impact of your work at a glance.
home.rolesWorkflowsDesc: Fine-grained management: reader, author, editor, admin.
home.openScienceDesc: Open Access compliance, DOI and ORCID integration.
home.recentDesc: Latest work validated by scientific committees.
home.noPublicationsYet: No publications yet. Check back soon.
home.contactPracticalDesc: Address, contacts and networks to stay connected.
home.socialNetworksDesc: Official announcements, calls for projects and live statistics.
home.ctaTitleAlt: Ready to join the AfricaData community?
home.ctaSubtitle: Join the platform, submit your publications and increase your visibility.
home.ctaSubtitleAlt: Publish your work, track your evaluations and collaborate with a network of African experts.

library.title: Library
library.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, author, domain, keywords...

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Team and values
about.heroSubtitle: The African digital center for collection, validation and dissemination of scientific data
about.missionText1: AfricaData is an innovative digital platform dedicated to promoting and disseminating African scientific research. We believe African science should have global visibility and lasting impact.
about.missionText2: Our mission is to create an integrated digital ecosystem where researchers, academics and professionals can collaborate, share their discoveries and contribute to the continent's scientific progress.
about.pillar1Desc: Access scientific data from all regions of the African continent.
about.pillar2Desc: Every piece of content is verified by scientific committees and sector experts.
about.pillar3Desc: Instant publication and advanced search engine to find relevant work in seconds.
about.pillar4Desc: Measure the impact, downloads and continental reach of your publications.
about.pillar5Desc: Connect researchers, laboratories and African universities around common projects.
about.pillar6Desc: Open access dissemination to maximize the visibility and impact of African research.
about.value1Desc: Make African science accessible to all without geographical or economic barriers.
about.value2Desc: Use the most modern technologies to promote scientific research.
about.value3Desc: Create spaces for exchange and collaboration among African researchers.
about.value4Desc: Maintain the highest standards of quality and scientific rigor.
about.ctaSubtitle: Become part of the African scientific revolution. Share your research with the world.
